message.entry: Incorrect message type, {1}. Supply the publisher with a message of type {0}.
The first input argument of the Publisher constructor uses the wrong type, {0}. Use a ros.Node object as the input argument. For more information, see the help for ros.Publisher.
Unable to create a publisher with topic name {0} and type {1}.
Error publishing a message with type {0} on topic name {1}.
An error occurred while shutting down the publisher.
Too many or too few input arguments. For more information, see the ros.Publisher help topic.
